description.title: Tenscan RPC - get public transaction data totals and compare
description.purpose: Calls scan_getPublicTransactionData to get transaction data, and to also compare the apparent total in the return value with the value returned from scan_getTotalTransactionCount. The test also performs some transactions and then checks that the transactions are included in subsequent calls to scan_getPublicTransactionData, that the page is correctly ordered in both the batch heights and timestamps.
